thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 09 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Birchcliff Energy Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share C$0.05

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Birchcliff Energy Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share C$0.05
text:
May 9 (Reuters) - Birchcliff Energy Ltd:
* BIRCHCLIFF ENERGY ANNOUNCES SOLID FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS AND POSITIVE OIL PRODUCTION TEST RESULTS FROM GORDONDALE AND CONDENSATE PRODUCTION TEST RESULTS FROM POUCE COUPE
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE C$0.05 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$0.09 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* PRODUCTION AVERAGED 76,323 BOE/D IN Q1 OF 2018, A 24% INCREASE FROM 61,662 BOE/D IN Q1 OF 2017
* QTRLY ADJUSTED FUNDS FLOW $0.31 PER BASIC COMMON SHARE * PRODUCTION AVERAGED 76,323 BOE/D IN Q1 OF 2018, A 24% INCREASE FROM 61,662 BOE/D IN Q1 OF 2017
* SEES 2018 ANNUAL AVERAGE PRODUCTION 76,000 - 78,000 BOE/D
* SEES 2018 ESTIMATED TOTAL CAPITAL EXPENDITURES 255.0 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
